buffer (21 of 32 overloads)

Create a new non-modifiable buffer that represents the given POD array. 

template<
    typename PodType,
    std::size_t N>
const_buffer buffer(
    const std::array< PodType, N > & data);
Return Value

A const_buffer value equivalent to: 

const_buffer(
    data.data(),
    data.size() * sizeof(PodType));
